content:
Hello Team,
I have a query related to EVN to Provenance mapping. As per GDoc, there is a field (event - :"+MSG.1+"^"+MSG.2") which is mapped with Provennace.activity.coding.display. However, as the datatype is CodeableConcept, so we can map it to Provenance.activity.text instead of using coding.display (as there is no coding.code mapped).
Please share your thoughts.
Thanks
